snippet: A former United States Army sniper is accused of being a contract killer hired to murder a D.E.A. agent and a government informant.
abstract: Former Army sniper Joseph Hunter, who is accused of leading international team of contract killers, claims his former boss South African drug- and gunrunner Paul Le Roux had threatened to kill him if he did not comply with orders; defense lawyers move to dismiss case saying government should not have used Le Roux as cooperating witness.
lead_paragraph: A former United States Army sniper is accused of being a contract killer hired to murder a D.E.A. agent and a government informant.

headline.main: Murder Plot Suspect Says Boss Threatened His Life
